      • count

        long count​(long firstBit,
           long lastBit)
        Returns number of bits with the value true in the range [firstBit, lastBit]. The range includes both firstBit and lastBit.
        Parameters:
        firstBit - the first (the least) bit of the range
        lastBit - the last (the greatest) bit of the range
        Returns:
        number of set bits in the range
